history.proof: intros n m p H1 H2. hauto use: Z.le_ge, Z.gt_lt, Z.mul_le_mono_pos_l, Z.ge_le.

original: intros n m p H1 H2. apply Zmult_ge_reg_r with (p:=Zpos p) in H2. apply Zge_trans with (m:=Z.mul (Zpos p) n) in H2. - rewrite Z.mul_comm in H2. rewrite Z.mul_comm. apply Z.mul_reg_l in H2. auto. - apply Zmult_ge_compat_l. + apply Z.mul_nonneg_nonneg. + apply Z.ge_le. + apply Z.ge_le in H1. auto.
